body.desc1: I craft responsive websites with cool design and great performance
body.desc2: Highly talented and open to work

info.about: A graduate of the National School of Informatics of Madagascar and always passionate about IT, I acquired solid training which allowed me to develop varied skills in this field. My portfolio presents a selection of my projects, ranging from programming to web development, including artificial intelligence and database management. Each project you will discover here reflects my passion, my commitment and my ability to solve complex problems. My goal is to continue to innovate and provide high quality solutions, whether in a professional or collaborative setting. I invite you to explore my achievements and to contact me for any collaboration or professional opportunity.

2.title: Novice immersion
2.description: An application to help new bachelor prospects of ENI integrate into the world of technologies, specifically in IT, and also into the vibrant city of Fianarantsoa

3.title: SMMEC reporting
3.description: A website for reporting. This application displays strategic information using charts and tables for the SMMEC company to help leaders make rational decisions

4.title: Salama Alert
4.description: A platform with a mobile part using React Native to send health emergency alerts that will be received by hospitals with a web application to manage these emergencies and respond in real-time

5.title: Digitalisation ACEEM
5.description: Implementation of an orientation module for ACEEM students and candidates. This module will allow students to orient themselves in the various ACEEM fields based on a personality test based on Holland's typology

6.technologies: React Ts Spring Boot Postgres Apache Beam
6.title: Ticket Management
6.description: A web application to manage user support tickets. This application is used by multiple users and allows tracking the status of the ticket and saving each status in CSV files
